sources.title: Fear And Desire (1953)
sources.description: Stanley Kubrick's first feature directorial debut that's set in a ficticious war in an unidentified country. The 1953 American anti-war film was directed, produced and edited by Stanley Kubrick and was written by Howard Sackler. It had a production team of fifteen people. Kubrick attempted to destroy all copies, but was unsuccessful. You can read more about the movie by going to its Wikipedia page . The video on this page is a mirror from here .

sources.title: Fear And Desire (1953)
sources.description: ear and Desire est le premier long métrage de Stanley Kubrick, en noir et blanc, sorti en 1953. L'action se déroule en période de guerre et se focalise sur un groupe de soldats. (vostfr, vf, en français) Le film anti-guerre américain de 1953 a été réalisé, produit et édité par Stanley Kubrick et a été écrit par Howard Sackler. Il y avait une équipe de production de quinze personnes. Kubrick a tenté de détruire toutes les copies, mais n'a pas réussi.

sources.title: Fear and Desire
sources.description: Title: Fear and Desire Summary: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires. Directed by: Stanley Kubrick Actors: Frank Silvera, Kenneth Harp, Paul Mazursky Production Company: Kubrick Family Release Date: 1 April 1953 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A ficticious war in an unidentified country provides the setting for this drama. Four soldiers survive the crash-landing of their plane to find themselves in a forest six miles behind enemy lines. The group, led by Lt. Corby, has a plan: They'll make their way to a nearby river, build a raft, and then, under cover of night, float back to friendly territory. Their plans for getting back safely are sidetracked by a young woman who stumbles across them as they hide in the woods, and by the nearby presence of an enemy general who one member of the group is determined to kill.

sources.title: Fear and desire (1953) [Colorized,4k,60fps]
sources.description: Fear and desire is a 1953 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com/   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

metadata.Plot: A ficticious war in an unidentified country provides the setting for this drama. Four soldiers survive the crash-landing of their plane to find themselves in a forest six miles behind enemy lines. The group, led by Lt. Corby, has a plan: They'll make their way to a nearby river, build a raft, and then, under cover of night, float back to friendly territory. Their plans for getting back safely are sidetracked by a young woman who stumbles across them as they hide in the woods, and by the nearby presence of an enemy general who one member of the group is determined to kill.
metadata.Actors: Frank Silvera, Kenneth Harp, Paul Mazursky
